messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Trying to make writing fun
messages.msgSnippet: SHOOT!  I wanted to add that the letters aren t coming from me , but from any one of a number of fun characters you can find on the website...including Santa,
messages.messageBody:
SHOOT! I wanted to add that the letters aren't coming from "me", but from any one of a number of fun characters you can find on the website...including Santa, the Tooth Fairy, and a few my kids made up.

Kristen


In my efforts to stay home more, and work at the hospital less, I've been trying to come up with a business at home idea. I decided on a personal letter writing business, since I love to write, sooooo I willl write personalized letters and make personalized certificates to/for kids, and there are creative writing opportunities too.

If you are interested, check out www.writingisfun.net

Kristen









[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
